message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product.  I think it would be extremely valuable to you.  How about a price of $14,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
